body.p:
Covington April 30 -- 64
Hon Thomas E Bramlette
Govenor of Kentucky
Dear Gov.

I enclose two petitions from the Judge of the Pendleton County Court asking you to offer a reward for the apprehension of two men charge with murder. I am some what familiar with both cases & both are murderers and I think both are cases in which a reward should be offered. The amount Should be sufficient to induce Some officer to undertake their capture

Very rspctly your
obt sevt
R B Carpenter
Comths Atty

Pendleton Co
Reward of $250 each --
Tho E Bramlette
Govr
2d May/64
